name: Mystic2Westerly
0:

”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Mystic is part Groton and part Stonington. RT 2 starts close to Westerly and travels from Pawcatuck through North Stonington, Ledyard, Preston and Norwich. Join us and hear what is happening in the area. Follow us at Mystic2Westerly on Instagram!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
